div.p:
Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem die
vltimo mensis Septembris anno Domini Mo iiijcmo lxxxijdo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affir
mata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Robertus blindsele electus fuit in officium prepositure pro anno sequente
et ad deseruiendum fideliter in dicto officio Juramentum prestitit corporale

Thomas de fife Alexander de camera filius Jacobus coming et Johannes vaus iunior eodem die
electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum et ad deseruiendum in huiusmodi officio pro communi commodo Juramenta
prestiterunt corporalia

Et eodem die philippus de Dunbrek alexander chaumer Moricius besat scissor et Duncanus
stralogh electi fuerunt in sergeandos pro anno futuro prestitis solitis Juramentis

Item eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes de camera capellanus ac procura
tor Alexandri Irvin de Drum protestabatur nomine procuratorio quo supra pro vno annuo redditu
duarum marcarum eidem domino de Drum annuatim et hereditarie debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in li scule hil infra dictum burgum de abirdene inter terram Sancti Johannis Je
rosolomitanum ex parte orientali et terram quondam domini Johannis de Kynloch' nunc sancti Ninianj ex
parte occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos presentavit in curia coram ballivis pro primo die huius processus Testibus thoma gardner
Johanne rede burgense et moricio besat seriando

Item eodem die dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Dutha
ci in ecclesia parrochiali de abirdene protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu duodecim solidorum et
sex denariorum dicto altari et eidem capellano eiusdem annuatim debit' et a longo tempore non
solut' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium inter terram Johannis more ex orien
tali parte et terram magni Wormot ex occidentali parte / ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus . Willelmo more thoma chepman burgensibus et philippo Dunbrek seriendo

Eodem die accedens ad barram Thomas prat burgensis huius burgi peciit tres pro
cessus per ipsum legittime ductos in tribus curiis capitalibus perlegi penes vnum annuum reddi
tum viginti duorum solidorum eidem thome annuatim et hereditarie debit' de quadam terra iacente
in vico nauium dicti burgi inter terram thome quhite ex parte australi et terram alexandri de
camera ex boriali parte tam de terra interiori quam anteriori / Post queuia quidem trium processum lec
turam peciit Idem Thomas prat Judicium curie super Recuperacione possessionis et
proprietatis eiusdem terre interioris et anterioris antedicte cum pertinenciis sibi dari in defectu so
lucionis prefati annuj redditus xxijorum solidorum sibi debit' et a longo tempore non solut' Vnde
curia bene et mature auisata et hora diei legunt expectata ceterisque peractis
que ordo Juris exigit et requirit / decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os thome
talyour Judicatoris curie / quod dictus Thomas prat peruenit ad suum clamium et adeptus
est proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre cum pertinenciis ob defectum solucionis annuj
redditus prenotati / teste curia

Eodem die prepositus consules et communitas concesserunt Dauid Duncanj alias seriando in supplementum ipsius
quinque marcas acquirendas de quocumque honesto et sufficienti viro recipiendo in fraternitatem
gilde huius burgi

Item eodem die Johannes de Kyntor constituit Willelmum de Kyntor filium suum / suum procuratorem
ad prosequendum legittime actionem suam aduersus Johannem smyth pro iniusta detencione vnius barelle
salmonum et in omnibus aliis causis ipsum concernentibus

Iniungitur Johanni smyth per ballivos responsurus et Juri periturus hodie ad octo dies peremptorie
ad sectam Willelmi Kintor procuratorie nomine patris suj pro iniusta detencione vnius barelle salmonum

The thrid dai of october yer' et cetera lxxxij Dauid galichtly put him in Wil
of the aldirman and balyeis for spilling of the price of the merket of victal / quhar
for he was adiugit in amerciament and toforbere in tym tocum vndir the pane of
xl s' tobe payt be him vnforgevin to Sanct nicholace wark ordanit
be the aldirman and ballies / with the said Dauyis awn' consent for yer' and day

Johne skynnar' and alexander alanson' androw Waus conuict be ane assise ilkane
of thaim is adiugit in amerciament of the court for spilling of price of victual in the
merket againis the law and statute of burgh and toforber' in tym tocum

Wil modan in amerciament for herbrying of meil and malt in his hous' before
it be present to the merket attour common ordinance

iiijto die mensis octobris predicti Willelmus blindsel inuenit plegium super Johannem low pro iniusta de
tencione l solidorum ab eodem racione certe taxe sibi assignat' et cetera et dictus Johannes pecijt diem
legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio quj sibi conceditur ad proximam curiam legalem videlicet
diem lune ad octo dies

The samen dai the action movit betuix Robert prat and androw murra eldar is
summittit to thir persons alexander chamer eldar and John' the vaus the balye chosin be
the said robert / and til John' Wormot and adam crafurd chosin be the said
androw for his part / the aldirman beand owyrman / quhilkis persons beand sworn'
sal decide the said actione in sa fer as thai can get knaulage And the saidis
partiez ar oblist be the faith' of thir bodijs tovndirly thare ordinance / and the
said action tobe endit be the saidis persons as law wil

The samyn dai the court decretit and ordanit Richart culan tocontent and pay
til maistir gilbert louson v s' of annuel acht til him of the Witsonday terme
last bypassit . becaus' he failyeit in his preif that he allegit of the
payment of the samen

Curia gilde burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per Robertum blindsele prepositum
eiusdem quarto die mensis octobris Anno Domini mo iiijcmo lxxxijdo

div.head: Commune consilium
div.p:
Alexander de camera
alexander menyes
Jacobus lesly
Johannes de Knollis
Johannes colisoune
Dauid symson'
alexander howison'
alexander rede
Dauid menyes
Johannes Wormot
gilbertus Vaus
Johannes Waus
thomas prat
andreas murray senior
Willelmus blindsele
Willelmus moore
Willelmus Kintor
Dauid mathoson
Walterus achneve
adam androsone
adam de crafurde
alexander hay
ricardus hil
Robertus prat
Willelmus moyses
Johannes glenmalvine
Ranaldus talyour
Willelmus de garuiach'

div.head: Appreciatores carnium
div.p:
Johannes glenmalvin Ranaldus talyour Ricardus hil alexander scrogs gilbertus leche
Edmundus hay Willelmus andirson Johannes vaus filius quondam dominj de many Symon
de gardin Willelmus de gariach' Jacobus Kennarty Willelmus de fivy thomas culan

div.head: Gustatores ceruisie
div.p:
In li crukit quartar de quo alexander chamer est sergeandus / Alanus smyth et geor
gius de Dys' / Item pro li evin quartar de quo philippus Dunbrek est seriendus Johannes skynner
et nicolaus lies / In li greyn vnde Duncanus straloch et seriendus Robertus sleich et
Willelmus coming scissor Et pro li futy quartar vnde moricius besat est sergeandus
alexander alanson' et henricus quhitebrow

The samyn dai the aldirman ballies consale and communite has concludit and orda
nit thir actis and statutis vndirwritin tobe obseruit and kepit for this yer'

In the first that na woman brew na sel ail fra this day furth' derrer'
than viij d' the galloun' and vj d' / and gif it be nocht wourthe the price / tobe
set be the discrecion of the cunnaris . vndir the pane of viij s' for the first
tyme / and alsmekil the second tym / the thrid tyme thare ledys tobe
tane oute and thai secludit fra the craft for yer' and day

Item that na baxtar brek the pais that is gevin him be the ballies / and quha
sa dois for the first defaute sal pay viij s' / at the next tym xvj s' and
at the thrid tyme the brede tobe eschet and himself tobe set in the goif
and secludit the craft for yer' and day

Item that quhat fleschar' that beis convict / for breking of price or that
sellis flesch or it be prisyt / at the first tym sal pay viij s' / alsmekle
at the tothir tyme and at the thrid tyme the flesch tobe eschet and he
tobe excludit the craft yer' and dai / and that na fleschar' blaw flesch
vndir the samen pain / nor sla flesch on the sounday vndir pain of eschete
of the samyn'

Item that na hukstar by na gudis vnto the tym it be present at the merket cors vndir
pain of ane vnlaw and eschet of the gudis and quhil the hour' of xij at none

Item that na man woman pas vtew the portis of the toune toby ony
gudis vndir pane of the vnlaw and eschet of the gudis bocht

Item that na caik bakaris be in the towne bot twa in ilke quartar / and
that thai baik cakys eftir the price of the victal askis vndir pain of the vnlaw
and deling of the brede and secluding of thaim fra the craft for yer' and day

Item that na fleschar' by na salmond fisch' na gret lyne fisch' before
that the toune be servit / and quhil the houre of xij / and thai sal tak
for thare labour' of the breking of the fisch' a penny of the schilling
and that ilkane haf in gret lyne tyme thare creil at the scammyl
for honeste and keping of the gate

Item that al the persons bath men and wemen quhilkis ar sclanderit of spil
ling of the merket / sal forber' and cum nocht in the merket vndir pain of presoning
the twa first dais that thai be fundin in the merket / and the third day
of banysing of the toune but othir remission'

Burgenses et fratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Roberti blindsele de
Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo secundo

Alexander burnat de leyis Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde causa
paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa prestito Juramento plegio thoma
prat pro oneribus debitis supportandis

Thomas de culane receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paterne
libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Johannes rede scissor gracia prepositi et consilij factus fuit liber burgensis tantum ad requestam
Ricardi boyl vnius clericorum parrochialum huius burgi Ita quod dictus Ricardus habebit summam debitam per
dictum Johannem pro libertate burgi predicta / qui quidem Johannes solitum et debitum prestitit Juramentum

Georgeus Dys' Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paterne libertatis
pro v s' datis preposito in bursa prestito solito Juramento

xixno die mensis Julij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiijo magister Walterus Drummond canonicus Dun
keldensis et vicarius huius burgi de Abirdene Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde dicti burgi absque solucione pecunie prestito solito Juramento / exceptis illis
de scot and lot et cetera

xxiijo die mensis Julij predicti de consensu prepositi et consilij patricius Donaldson' filius quondam Do
naldi ioffrasone Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paterne li
bertatis pro v s' datis preposito prestito solito Juramento

xixno die Augusti anno prescripto Alexander ranyson' cordonarius receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa
quj quidem alexander solitum prestitit Juramentum

xxvj die mensis augusti predicti de consensu diuersorum communis consilij ad instanciam prepositi Jacobus smyth recep
tus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento

xxijo die Septembris anno et cetera lxxxiijo / Johannes ross' pistor ad Requestam venerabili viri magistri
Johannis hay Rectoris de crowdan . Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum de consensu prepositi et diuersorum
consilij prestito solito Juramento

iiijto die mensis Septembris predicti / Andreas Dullop et Thomas smyth Recepti fuerunt in
liberos burgenses tantum ad instanciam prepositi quorum quilibet prestitit solitum Juramentum

Eodem die Willelmus de bynny textor factus fuit liber burgensis et frater gilde racione paterne
libertatis quj conuenit cum preposito prestito solito Juramento

vjto die octobris anno supradicto Willelmus malisson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde causa paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa prestito Juramento consueto

Item recepti fuerunt ad instanciam prepositi Jacobus libbertoune quj desponsauit filiam burgensis
et Willelmus beldy couparius in liberos burgenses prestito solito per eorum quemlibet Juramento solito et cetera

In the gild court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be Robert blindsel aldirman
and the brethir of the gild the ferd day of october' yer' et cetera lxxxij / thir ar the lave
of the actis and statutis ordanit tobe obseruit for this yer' tocum as forsaid is

It is thocht expedient and commandit that na candil makaris sel candil bot be
wecht / and that thai sel for iij d' the pund with gude clene and dry weik

Item that na burges duelland within the burgh haf na forstallar' vndir him
to pas in the cuntre to forstal wol hyde na skyn' na that himself pas
in the cuntre toforstal vndir the pane of fyve merkis And that na man within
the burgh tak na fremmyt mennys siluer towayr into the hurting or sca
thing of nichburis of the toune vndir pain of fyve merkis for the vnlaw and
tyning of his fredome

Item that na merchand man of this burgh opin his buthe dur' todo ony
merchandis' outhir sel or by apon the Sonday vndir the pain of a pund of
wax or the valu of it tobe rasyt of ilke faute vnforgevin and tobe
applijt to the kirk werk

Item that thar be bot four' baxtaris quhilkis sal furnys' the toune of gude stuf
for this yer' / and thai tilhaf vndir thaim sic persons as thai wil stand for
and answer' to the town' and that thai haf evyr stuf to sustene the ton' vndir
pane of viij s' for the first and second tym and the thrid tym of secluding
of thaim fra the craft for yer' and day / And thire ar the personis Nicol baxtar
and ane with him Thom gardner and ane with him / Wil bughan and ane with him
Wil clerk and ane with him / and ilkane of thir iiij tilhaf thare merk
on thare brede by the quhilk it may be knawyn / And that nane
by quhete within the toune or in landwart bot ane of thir four' and it
tobe distribute be the sycht of thaim

Item that na talch be schippyt na barrellit tobe sald vtew the ton' vndir
pain of eschet of the talch quhar' evyr it may be tayntit or fundin and
viij s' vnforgevin of the sellar' / and thare persons and gudis tobe dangerit to
the king as law wil

Item that na swyne pas furth of band les than thai haf a ring in thare wort
for it is vndirstandin that thar wort dois gret scath to the land / and that this
be done and obseruit vndir pain of viij s' and eschet of the swyn'
